entities.name: house-elf
entities.description: A type of elf that is known to be old and naked. It has a quantity of white hair growing out of its large, batlike ears.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: The main character in the story who is present in the room.

entities.name: house
entities.description: The house where Harry and the rest are present.

entities.name: Mistress
entities.description: A person who is being referred to as the owner of the house.

entities.name: brats
entities.description: The children of Mistress who are causing trouble in her house.

entities.name: blood traitor
entities.description: A person who is being referred to as a traitor and has a connection with blood.

relationships.description: The house-elf does not take any notice of Harry.
The house-elf is concerned about Mistress and her house.
The house-elf disapproves of the brats for messing up Mistress's house.
